thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com | 5 of 185
thread.title: Amel Tresnjic

author: Amel Tresnjic
title: Amel Tresnjic
text: Been using Pond5 for many years now. Fantastic service provider of great royalty free content that I use everyday in my documentary film-making. Unlike with other providers, what I love the most is that each purchase comes with a proof of licence in my name. This makes life so much easier when needing to provide proof to YouTube or film festivals. Also the weekly Freebies are brilliant. Happy customer!
